WorkItem.Description:
When installing Toad 6.8 I checked the box that integrated Toad into [SQL Server](https://mindmajix.com/ssis-training) Management Studio. When I launched management studio it gave me an error (something about unable to load the add-in). Now, whenever I right-click on any node in management studio I get this pop-up:

XamlObjectWriterException
Cannot set unknown Member
'{clr-namespace;Quest.Toad.SSMSAddin.Menus;assembly=Dell.ToadSSMSAddinCore, Version 7.0.10.0, Culture=Neutral, PublicKeyToken=....}ToadCommandMenuItem.CommandId

At this point I just want SQL Server management studio back to how it was so I can right-click on nodes.

I've completely uninstalled Toad 6.8 but the issue remains.

Please help
Natasha Mary
WorkItem.Summary: Unable to remove Toad Integration from SQL Server 2014 Management Studio
